title: @Riot

embed.description: From the original clone-tastic One For All to the frenetic manatee magic of Ultra Rapid Fire, featured game modes provide unique spins on the classic League formula. It's time to kick things off with the next game mode in the rotation: Ascension is now live!

body:
*EDIT: No longer relevant.*

Someone messed up.

Might want to remove that post before people start complaining.

Sincerely, a concerned Quinn main with nothing better to do.

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}

replies.body: RGM isn't up today, it's up tomorrow. The announcement is at least 14 hours premature.
Ahhh I see... well at least we get to see what's next in the RGM queue earlier :3

Actually, we got to see this 3 weeks ago. Every time the RGM announcement goes up it shoes what modes will be available for the next 4 weeks (including the current week), except in rare situations where it will show a "blank" with a question mark icon (only happened with URF, Siege and Doombots, if I'm not mistaken).
I meant that we get to see what's in three week's time sooner (i.e. the fact that One for all is for two weeks in a row)
